title: Kindred - pretty cool
body:
I reckon it is a very creative and imaginative champ. Very interested to see how it / they play.

3 thumbs up for riot.

replies.body: as long as she can get to 80 stacks she will be useful

Doubt it will see much ADC play though. Does seem more like a jungler. I mean, in lane you would most likely never stack your passive. (which is a 1.25% Current HP damage on your autos).

Can you imagine a Devourer Kindred... might be a bit much. (edit: just read that its only marks ENEMY jungle camps and you can only get 6 stacks off jungle creeps before it targets champions only)

Granted it is on the PBE for a reason so it will be nerfed if necessary but still.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/09/915-pbe.html
it is supposed to be played jg though right?
Yeh, they said Marksman/Jungler. Just saying, seems like you won't utulise the full kit as an ADC
I think it's extremely creative and interesting that their ult can save enemies too
